sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/Services/auth.service'; import { TokenService } from 'src/app/Services/token.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signin', templateUrl: './signin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signin.component.css'] }) export class SigninComponent implements OnInit { public form = { email: null, password: null }; public error:any = null; constructor( private Auth: AuthService, private Token: TokenService, ) { } onSubmit() { this.Auth.login(this.form).subscribe({ next: (data) => { this.handelResponse(data) }, error: (err) => { this.handleError(err) }, }); } handelResponse(data:any){ this.Token.handel(data.access_token); } handleError(error:any) { this.error = error.error.error; } ngOnInit() { } }
